definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
vast as the open sea (idiom); fig. extensive (library)

sentences.english: Hao, translate this into Chinese, and then Detong post it among Yin Xin.
sentences.chinese: 浩，将其译成中文，然后茶桶将其公布在《印心》里。

sentences.english: Meng mentioned this story to gain the workers’ trust.
sentences.chinese: 孟翔浩提到这个故事是想要获得工人们的信任。

sentences.english: The Zhou dynasty was founded by the Ji family and had its capital at Hào.
sentences.chinese: 周代是由籍家庭，而且其资本在浩。

sentences.english: Evonne Xu is an attorney practicing with Howard & Howard Attorneys PLLC.
sentences.chinese: 徐洋是一名在浩德华德律师事务所从业的律师。

sentences.english: This week in our series, Kay Gallant and Harry Monroe tell more about that period.
sentences.chinese: 这在我们的系列，凯门罗浩和哈利告诉周的任期。

sentences.english: If it sounds ho-hum to you , it will to others too .
sentences.chinese: 如果它听起来浩哼声这对于你们来说，将他人太。

sentences.english: The "Little Hero" had become a symbol of China's triumph over disaster.
sentences.chinese: “小林浩”已经成为中国战胜灾难的一个符号。

sentences.english: Two hours later, young Lin Hao starts to move the body to crawl outward slowly.
sentences.chinese: 两个小时后，小林浩开始慢慢挪动身子向外爬。

sentences.english: But Meng, a sophomore majoring in international economics and trade, didn’t give up.
sentences.chinese: 但就读于国际经贸专业大二年级的孟翔浩没有放弃。

sentences.english: Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Cheng Hao.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我作自我介绍，我的名字叫程浩。

sentences.english: And hence it appeared in disciple Hao's dream.
sentences.chinese: 也因此它显现于弟子浩的梦中。

sentences.english: Peach and hao nine entered into a relationship.
sentences.chinese: 桃姬和浩九进入了热恋期。

sentences.english: Since the investigations of Stade and Wellhausen, such changes have been assumed in increasing proportions.
sentences.chinese: 由于调查比赛和浩，这种变化已被假定在增加的比例。

sentences.english: But this is just the beginning, says Dr Greenhalgh.
sentences.chinese: 但这只是千里征程第一步，格林浩尔博士说。

sentences.english: Cui Ying really asked PiaoZhongHao, see all this section chief is deliberately against her.
sentences.chinese: 崔英真问了朴钟浩，明白了这一切是科长故意针对她。

definition: edge of a tortoiseshell/see 冉冉[ran3 ran3]
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
